title: Dianne Buswell posts emotional message to Dev Griffin after shock exit
text:
Dianne admitted she was devastated in a heartbreaking post praising Dev’s efforts (Picture: Instagram/BBC)

Dianne Buswell has taken her elimination from Strictly Come Dancing hard, and has sent a heartbreaking message to Dev Griffin following their shock exit.

The pair, who had been doing well in the competition, had fallen to the bottom of the leaderboard after their Cha Cha to Dancing With A Stranger by Sam Smith – getting eliminated by the judges after the dance off when they opted to save Viscountess Emma Weymouth and Aljaz Skorjanec instead.

Dianne was seen holding on to Dev as she broke down in tears on the dancefloor during their last dance together, before the other competitors flocked to be with her in a group hug.

After the show was aired, Dianne posted a smiley photo of the pair behind-the-scenes of their week one routine to Build Me Up Buttercup, the Australian native admitted she wasn’t ready to end her run with Dev on the show.

Advertisement

Advertisement

She wrote: ‘My heart is broken. this guy had so much to give and worked sooooo hard I’m so sorry your journey was cut short you have done me so proud, every week you would say you just didn’t want to let me down!

‘Dev you sooo didn’t you were a dream to teach and you were turning into such a great dancer thank you so much for everything.’

Dev and Dianne didn’t impress with their Cha Cha (Picture: BBC)

Dev also posted a similar message after the announcement, and declared: ‘It’s been incredible! I wish I could have stayed a bit longer but sadly my strictly ride has come to an end.

‘Thank you to all of the production team, wardrobe, make up, crew, pro dancers and celebs for looking after me and being like family to me these past few weeks.

‘@diannebuswell you are the best! Thank you for being such an amazing partner and always pushing me to be the best version of myself.

‘I’ve loved every minute of this! Good luck to the other celebs 😘😘 I’m off to put my feet up for a bit.’

More: Strictly Come Dancing Furious Strictly viewers claim phones were jammed for Dev and Dianne Strictly’s Dianne Buswell leaves viewers heartbroken as she breaks down in tears after elimination Strictly threaten to boycott show after controversial Dev and Dianne exit

It seems that fans were equally as devastated, even threatening to boycott the show after ‘bizarre’ marking from the judges and their choice to eliminate ‘team Red Devils’.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Other claimed they were unable to get through on the phone lines, crying fix as they struggled to place their vote.

Strictly Come Dancing continues next Saturday at 6.40pm on BBC One.

description: Dev and Dianne were eliminated from Strictly Come Dancing and Dianne has taken the shock exit hard.
